name: Easy Game (
description:
Easy game is exactly how it sounds...easy!

If you beat the game, which you will because it is EXTREMELY easy you will be rewarded with an amazing prize!

Features:
·Epic Pixel art graphics
·Groundbreaking platforming
·As much effort in the game as I put into this page
·Fun for the whole family(please make your cat play it)


Good luck!(You won't need it the game is easy)
